name: Roomer
description: Roomer: A comprehensive platform designed to help students find the perfect PGs, hostels, and flats with ease. It features advanced search filters, wishlist management, secure authentication,making the process of finding accommodation simple and efficient.

name: Promptify
description: Promptify is a web-based application designed to assist users in generating creative prompts for various purposes. Whether you're a writer looking for inspiration, a student working on a project, or someone in need of ideas for brainstorming, Promptify can help spark your creativity.

name: Weebopedia (Under Development)
description: Weebopedia is a website all about cartoons from Japan called anime. You can find out information about different animes, like their stories and characters. Plus, there's a place where you can talk to other people who like anime and share your thoughts about them. It's like a big online club for anime fans!
